Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory28.jpg'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Why are you still here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Relax. I'm not human, I don't die that easily.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "There's nothing to apologize for. This is war. No one comes out the other side unscathed every time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That said... it seems that I'll have to rest up for a while.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But... there's no next time...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Let me ask youâ€”the Eden that you envision... what is it like?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Equal, free, safe...', 3: '16', 4: 'Just like the one you envision, I think.', 5: '17'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Ha. I guess we're similar, aren't we?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What a crafty answer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "The apocalypse hasn't ended, not just because of the Punishing Virus or the war... It's because of the humans. Because of human nature.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The exploiters and the exploited, the oppressors and the oppressed... those who make choices, and those who get their choices taken away... This... loop, it never ends.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Eventually... they don't even lie about it anymore, those prideful bastards.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But no one has the right to decide someone else's fate. No one gets to say who lives or dies, who stays, and who is left behind.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Closing your eyes so you can't see, trying to forget if you did see... Running away if you can't forget. Up there, far away, with everything you would forsake.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Better to stand where the world refuses to face, to challenge it, to create a real "Eden".', 4: '1'}
{2: '...Why would you fight so hard for that?', 3: '27', 4: "You're the idealist, aren't you?", 5: '28'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Why? For the Eden I envision, of course...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Perhaps, as much as it pains me to admit it. Maybe that's why... we're similar.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'A naive idealist.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Like you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'As long as there are humans like you, I guess the world is not beyond saving.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But how can there be more of you on that flying boat, I wonder?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's create the real Eden.", 3: '34', 4: 'I look forward to your Eden.', 5: '34'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Do you know why I saved you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Because you promised?', 3: '36', 4: "No, I don't...", 5: '36'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Because, in my Eden, you'll be safe...", 4: '1'}
